name: Bogged
description:
Bogged: Last stand!

Your hero's vehicle is bogged in mud and You must defend against remotely controlled mines for as long as possible.

Controls:
* Left mouse click and drag to rotate
* Space to shoot

Made as a small learning project and made in very limited time constraints - haha, i love to learn this way! 

Tech used:
* BabylonJS -> 3D engine
* React -> UI
* Blender
